module.name: constructive_solid_geometry_2d
module.keywords: solid model, solid replica, constructive solid geometry

purpose.p: This part of ISO 10303 specifies an application module for the representation of two-dimensional solid objects.

inscope.li: replication of a solid model with possible linear transformation;
items within the scope of application module Area 2d, ISO/TS 10303-1631.

uof.name: Constructive_solid_geometry_2d
uof.description: The Constructive_solid_geometry_2d UoF specifies the data structure for the representation of a solid model in a 2D geometric space.
